Job Summary:
4-5 Days per week (40h per week)
Basic up to $5500 + AWS + VB
Islandwide
Responsibility:
A registered pharmacist in accordance with relevant Acts and Regulations.
Accurately dispense prescriptions and provide interventions.
Provide support for telepharmacy services by addressing requests from Pharmacy Executives.
Observe and adhere to the Code of Ethics outlined by the Singapore Pharmacy Council.
Collaborate with other store staff and the supply chain to ensure sufficient stock levels.
Monitor product expiry dates and execute stock-taking exercises accurately.
Take direct responsibility for achieving Division A Sales target and other assigned targets.
Submit weekly, monthly reports, and other requested documentation to management.
Undertake assigned portfolios and patient care projects as directed by management.
Provide weekly PE (Pharmacy Executive) roster to the roster team (if applicable).
Request dispensing materials as needed.
Requirements:
We are seeking a registered pharmacist who is licensed with the Singapore Pharmacy Council.
The ideal candidate should possess excellent clinical competency and have a strong passion for providing and advancing pharmaceutical care.
By submitting your personal data and/or resume to us in connection with your job application, you will be deemed to have agreed and consented to us collecting, using, retaining, and disclosing your personal data and/or resume to prospective employers for the purpose of the evaluating, processing and administration by the company relating to this job application.

*We regret to inform you that only shortlisted candidates would be notified*
We wish you all the best in your career search.

You are welcome to visit our website at http://www.rkgroup.sg/
